name: Rik Sarkar
content: Rik Sarkar - University of Edinburgh Rik Sarkar Reader (Associate Professor) School of Informatics, University of Edinburgh About My interests are in data science, machine learning, security and privacy and Biomedical engineering of proteins and drugs. This year I will be teaching a course on Advanced topics in Machine Learning. Visit our research group website for more details Research Interests Machine learning and Optimization Private and Secure Data Science Analysis of Generative Models Topological Data Analysis Network Analysis and Graph ML AI for Biomedical Engineering Contact Address: 10 Crichton Street Informatics Forum 3.45 Edinburgh EH8 9AB United Kingdom Phone: +44 (0) 131 650 4444 Fax: +44 (0) 131 651 1426 Email:
